Review.Titre: You won't get the support they tell you.
Review.Contenu: The only thing that matters to me is support. This company pitches 100% U.S. based support. I have called support at least 7 times. NOT ONCE did I get someone in the U.S. NOT ONCE! If you're willing to suffer with the mind-numbing experience of offshore tech support, you might as well hire another hosting company and save the premium that these people charge for supposedly offering a superior experience.

Review.Titre: Stay Far Away
Review.Contenu: Stay Far AwayHosting a VPS server for a single URL initially cost $59, but the price increased to $76 without any apparent justification other than CPanel increasing their prices.  Dissatisfied with this unexplained increase and frustrated by the subpar customer service, I opted to switch to a different hosting company, which I am way happier with.1.	The decline in customer service quality became evident during the COVID period, with support staff scattered around the globe, It's like they're playing a global game of hide and seek, and nobody really knows what's going on. The misinformation provided by the team was particularly frustrating.2.	Even if you are fortunate enough to escalate an issue to Senior Tech Support, the process involved jumping through hoops to get to the same person who has been dealing with your issue as no one is willing to provide their ext. number. So each time you call you get a subpar person who has to verify you every time you call. 3.	Since the onset of the pandemic, the tech support team seemed to transition into sales roles, actively promoting non-essential products instead of resolving the immediate technical problems.4.	Adding to the list of grievances, my account was neglected to be deleted despite numerous emails and phone calls requesting cancellation. Even after 30 days and having migrated all my data out, the account still remains active, necessitating further contact with support just to terminate the service.For those seeking a provider synonymous with poor service, misinformation, disarray, and unwarranted headaches, this company is the perfect choice.

Review.Titre: Poor QOS
Review.Contenu: Poor service, downtime, random support staff handing ticket every few hours, over priced.

Review.Titre: I strongly advise against using Liquid…
Review.Contenu: I strongly advise against using Liquid Web's Dedicated Server with fully managed support. This company seems to favor new customers, often neglecting existing ones. My experience reflects this, as my requests (Ticket: 13082580) have been consistently overlooked, even for simple tasks. The account managers, Nathan A. and Steven L. have demonstrated a lack of professionalism and responsiveness, failing to reply to emails and exhibiting arrogance. For nearly five months, I have been attempting to obtain a quote for migrating our server to a new one. However, the account managers appear more interested in extracting additional fees, leveraging the complexity of migrating my current server. Consequently, I am in the process of moving my dedicated server services to a different provider to avoid further interactions with these unscrupulous individuals. Iskan.

Review.Titre: Managed Dedi Server Fiasco
Review.Contenu: I moved a large client on a managed dedi server to a managed dedi server with LW for extra support and expanded features. I was mislead and lied to the whole way. If I didn't know the right question to ask, they took advantage and did not educate me so I could make an informed choice. I did a lot of research but it was an area that was beyond my technical expertise. The migration was a nightmare but I hoped that it would get better once settled. Not hardly. They have a wonderful Tech Support team but they cannot change the short-comings in the server and lack of features, way less than what we moved from. The stress and problems this has caused is tremendous.

Review.Titre: Liquid Web has singled us out
Review.Contenu: Liquid Web has singled us out, targeted us, and requested personal information that is not standard nor required, as stated in their public privacy policy.  We were looking for an alternative provider other than Godaddy, so we pre-paid LiquidWeb for a 3-year subscription to use a Virtual Private Server (VPS).  They told us that we were a fraud, refused to tell us why, and immediately mandated that we email them two government-issued identifications.  NOTE: Their request is not an industry standard to our knowledge with any other server hosting providers such as Godaddy.  They also have no public privacy policy to ensure safeguards for requesting and storing government identifications.  We asked if they could provide a secure encrypted way to send them two forms of ID, and they would not provide one.  So we offered to send them other forms of identification that are less sensitive in nature, and they rejected them.  They refused to tell us what precisely they are looking for in our two forms of government ID to make sure everything is correct when purchasing VPS services, which couldn't be accomplished by alternative methods.  Their public terms of service don't require any form of government ID from all of their new and existing customers.  NOTE: They are not a financial institution where requesting government identifications is part of KYC and industry standards.  We also never gave them permission to pull credit, etc.  We feel targeted, mistreated, and discriminated against.  They selectively created barriers to entry and mandates for us.  We have done them no wrong and provided all the standard information stated in their Privacy Policy under the Customers section.  We have all the email evidence to support this complaint.

Review.Titre: WiredTree was much better than Liquid Web
Review.Contenu: Was with WiredTree which was a much better company in terms of service before Liquid Web bought them out. The co kept us on an old overpriced plan and refused to help us get a better plan or migrate. The only offer was to signup as a new client and migrate everything with 0 help from them or their sales team. The so called account representative even stopped responding to emails, hence we cancelled.Bottom line is they do not care for existing customers, all their efforts are placed into onboarding more unknowingly customers that will get white glove service on the way in, but no service after that.They will milk you for all the overpriced charges they can until you seek something better.

Review.Titre: Worst support - treat clients like horribly
Review.Contenu: Worst support, they treat you like an absolute moron, thinking you are ok with a copy paste status from 7 hours ago, and telling you to deal with it.  No options no real updates.  WE all know they resell the exchange services from rackspace but at least they have a crappy work around and gave customers better updates.  Hopefully we can move everyone off of your servers so you feel the result of your action.

Review.Titre: This used to be my favorite company…
Review.Contenu: This used to be my favorite company because their support team was truly heroic. After covid support became bogged down. Every single time I call them nowadays I get somebody who is lazy and unmotivated and fails to solve my problem and I often find the solution myself. I'm just so tired of the situation and I thought I would come on here and warn other business owners. Most people don't have the time to come on here and complain because they have busy schedules and better things to do.

Review.Titre: Ticket 12350384 took 5 days to resolve
Review.Contenu: The Ticket 12350384 opened 5/19/23Finally part 1 resolved 5/24/23 5 days later.  :( 1) took numerous call ins due to inactivity or delays that were caused by lazy staff who did not read prior ticket notes where needed details or authorization was already given.2) Level 1 Technicians were easily confused, not able to help properly and afraid to seek help and rather delayed... delayed... delayed- I Asked for Support Managers and had initial response that was professional and appreciated but then no follow up by support management 3) When I finally requested a Level 3 Technician, Alex Silkin was the only person who was excellent in both support (stayed after shift for nearly 2 hours) and follow up communication as well as taking initiative to check the ticket when in the following day.  Can not give high enough praise re Alex's work ethic!

Review.Titre: Looking for another hosting company ...
Review.Contenu: Have been with Liquidweb for a few years and was very happy.Several things lead to a frustrated customer.Since December when our emails got lost (still are actually because the .ost files can't be imported in our new accounts), I've spent my time with the support team on the website chat and in tickets.Convinced me to upgrade for a new server and then the migration team didn't take the proper actions, our websites was offline for several hours today (losing business is not something ideal for a business owner...)Not to mention the big loading time when trying to update pages on the website ...The service and the competence of the people involved has dropped considerably.Take for example ticket no: 12419834

Review.Titre: Liquid Web is the most expensive web host. + Tax
Review.Contenu: We Left Liquid Web because we found a web host that offered a fully managed VPS with a better configuration than Liquid Web at 1/3 the price & NO TAX! Liquid Web was charging us $150 s month for their (lowest VPS Configuration) +TAX. Constant upselling, scheduled and unscheduled updates and service interruption at the worst times. Your biggest problem will be leaving Liquid Web. They will grill you and treat you like a criminal because you want to close the account. It took 9 business days for them to approve closing the account. There are better VPS pricing than Liquid Web. One of the most expensive Hosting companies we've ever seen.

Review.Titre: Very sad!
Review.Contenu: Very sad!, A once great company has gone down the drain, they have outsourced their support to India, and we all know how that story ends.  I have been with this company for 5 years and their negligent server management has caused my websites to basically become vulnerable and my SEO rankings are falling by the day. The damages to my company are mind boggling. My downgrade request via ticket number 10728244 has also been ignored.

Review.Titre: Addition of Nexus with migration made us leave
Review.Contenu: I was with you guys forever but as soon as you pushed us and forced us over to Nexus and messed up our migration expected us to pay for 3 months while you figured it out I have to give this review. You also changed your ticketing process where you have to log into confirm every time you enter a ticket. And then your system doesn't recognize that it's the same ticket or conversation. This is absolutely ridiculous and we left because of itResponse to your answer. It's interesting how fast you get back because I left a bad review. When I can't even get a phone call or anything when I put in multiple tickets.  This point we have completely left and migrated and there's nothing left for you to do. You had your chance

Review.Titre: SAVE MONEY AND FIND ANOTHER WEB HOST
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately The Mainstream Does Not Know that LiquidWeb.com charges 3 times as much for any of their servers, especially VPS. Their lowest end costs $150 + Tax per month. Charging tax is against the law for anyone, you dont have to be a reseller in most if not all states. And they Push for proof to be exempt from a charge that shouldn't exist. The IRS will eventually catch up with their practice of charging tax and then it will be bye bye!I have never heard of a web hosting company charging tax. I am with another hosting comping charging me $50 per month for a high end VPS with 8 Gig of Ram & 250Gig Hard Drive. Never get up sales or up charges or shut down for maintenance.

Review.Titre: They did 4 big mistakes in my 10 days…
Review.Contenu: They did 4 big mistakes in my 10 days of experience. One of them was they accidentally charged me a very large amount of USD that was meant to be for another client, after apologizing the amount of money that went out of my bank never came back the same, was and still missing money that they are not willing to return. What I know is when somebody makes a mistake he is responsible to pay for the side costs. Too much talking from the sales dept before I purchase some service, but in reality what sales promise is not close to the reality. Stay away from this company!

Review.Titre: OVER PRICED & LOW QUALITY CUSTOMER SERVICE, NOT  RECOMMENDED.
Review.Contenu: LOW QUALITY CUSTOMER SERVICE.We have been a liquid web customer  for hosting for 10+ years. Support was generally OK and rather good. However over the last 2 years customer service has been  almost completely outsourced from the USA, and the quality of tech support and customer service has steadily  deteriorated beyond recognition. It is now very low quality, poor to non existent tech support. Now when you call in for a tech support issue, thier response is typically sorry, that's “OUT OF MY SCOPE OF SERVICE”  for pretty much everything!  I no longer recommend Liquid web hosting to anyone. The hosting service is way overpriced compared to it's competition and now with the low quality service you get, it's not worth it. You should definitely look for a better hosting company elsewhere and not use Liquid web.

Review.Titre: Inaccurate Price and Provisioning…
Review.Contenu: Inaccurate Price and Provisioning estimates: The initial pricing and provisioning estimates proved to be misleading. Their behavior raised doubts: While their response times were impeccable during the purchasing phase, the situation took a downturn after the credit card transaction went through! Suddenly, we were confronted with delays in procuring parts, and the clock had already begun ticking on the subscription. Their initial estimate of 1-2 days of provisioning has now stretched into a frustrating one-week delay, with no progress in sight but they were happy to take our money. Additionally, it's crucial to watch out for concealed expenses related to backups that are not counted in the advertised costs. I initially started with a single server to assess their service quality before committing to larger orders, but unfortunately, they've already left me feeling let down. I'm glad I did not place a large order with them. [Ticket #: 12760779]

Review.Titre: been with them for 7 years...
Review.Contenu: been with them for 7 years...now, support is extremely poor.tried providers our there and find out, others are now cheaper and better, much better.every opportunity to extract money will be used.used to be great. projectile, going down.

Review.Titre: LiquidWeb completely destroyed my livelihood…
Review.Contenu: PLEASE, DO NOT HOST WITH THEM - DO NOT LET THIS HAPPEN TO YOULiquidWeb completely destroyed my livelihood yesterday. I received a notice that my account with them was being terminated and I had 24 hours to move over 200,000 files. I still do not know why my account was terminated. The managers refused to speak with me about it because I was "no longer a customer". I was able to get the files but they completely destroyed my databases with no remorse. After years of being self-sufficient, LiquidWeb destroyed my livelihood in 24 hours with no explanation and no remorse.

Review.Titre: I contacted support regarding to the…
Review.Contenu: I contacted support regarding to the settings, after the account was created, payment was charged and account was blocked for no reason. You want to get the new account, send same amount again :-)It is 14 days since that and I still did not receive money back. First I get info money need to be refunded on 30th at the latest. Now I have info I have to contact the bank as the money are in block in escrow money should be sent 14 days ago. And solve everything on your own dear client we dont care by.If this is customer support approach to such a simple thing as payment for new service, I dont want to see what support I will get if there will be any more difficult problem connected with service itself. I cannot recommend that company to anyone as it is clear representation of complete dilettantism from the start.

Review.Titre: Terrible service, terrible company
Review.Contenu: Terrible service. Refuse to help in any way. Refuse to let me talk to the manager.

Review.Titre: Not the same company as it was before Covid
Review.Contenu: I can't trust Liquid Web anymore and I advise everyone to look elsewhere. I signed up a week ago (Aug 14, 2023) because prior to 2020, I found Liquid Web to be the best hosting company and was using them for years. I immediately noticed a change on the first day of signing up. The first day of signing up for the 2 GB RAM VPS General Essential plan, they said I had to cancel my account twice because their team weren't able to "set up provision" as they've failed both time. No biggie, but they kept charging my card rather than just handling it internally. I had to voice this to them and get my refunds. I should have walked away at this point, but I gave them another chance and that was a mistake.When my account was activated, I was only able to log in once into InterWorx before it suddenly went down. Their support team kept saying someone new picked up the ticket and it was as if no one cared or knew what to do. My Interworx login has been down for the entire time. One support person flat out lied to me that the site was up, while the rest (including online websites to check to see if sites were down) confirmed that the site was still down.I've requested to cancel and have them issue me a refund, but they are not issuing me a refund.Everyone, PLEASE stay away. This company is no longer the trusted Liquid Web it used to be prior to 2020.Edit: They are issuing me a refund.

Review.Titre: Support is absolute garbage
Review.Contenu: When I moved to LW many years ago they had "heroic support" and it was true. Now they have some of the worst support I have ever had to deal with. Support reps are unable to resolve issues, tickets get opened and take days to resolve or are closed but not actually fixed. Its a total joke. If all you need is hardware there are cheaper providers. Dont come here for support.

Review.Titre: Fraudulent activity from Liquidweb
Review.Contenu: We were using Liquidweb for server hosting for some time, then switched completely to AWS. We canceled in December 2022 through their online portal. For four more months they continued to charge us $175/mo. Once we realized what was happened, contacted them and they said that they were charging us for a firewall for a server we didn't have and they claimed we had not canceled everything and refused to refund it. They also said we had to cancel again, even though we had received the termination email 12/23/2022. We terminated everything visible in their portal, it didn't notify us that there was anything else, and when we went into the portal to review our account, it did not show anything active as a service so we couldn't even know there was something still "active" after termination. Their support even acknowledged IN WRITING that we could not have known there was a service we were still be charged for through their own portal. We reported all this to the credit card company, got a credit, and LiquidWeb just re-charged us for everything the credit card had credited back after they lost. Now we have to go through the whole dispute process with the credit card company again. This is beyond poor customer service to fraudulent behavior.

Review.Titre: Unbelievably bad customer service
Review.Contenu: I purchased a managed dedicated server with CentOS and WHM/cPanel on a 50% off for the lifetime of the server Black Friday special. I have been a Liquid Web customer for more than twelve years, and this is my fourth server with them in this time.Six months later, the server could not be updated because CentOS 7 is the last version WHM/cPanel is going to support. cPanel 110.0 is the last version to support CentOS 7. The current version is now 114.0.8.This was announced by cPanel at least nine months before my purchase, so Liquid Web had to have known yet continued to sell servers with cPanel and an EOL operating system.I cannot update to benefit from new features in cPanel, and security will become an issue in less than a year when support for security patches is completely discontinued. This is on a box that would typically have a 5-6-year lifespan for someone like me.Liquid Web insists that I need to buy a new server to update the OS and refuses to carry my lifetime discount over to the new server. I am being financially punished for their mistake, and it's going to cost me thousands more than it should.This is in addition to the complete fiasco of getting this box set up. The wrong control panel was installed, so the whole server had to be reformatted, the box was not configured properly, and getting the billing right with the Black Friday discount took seven months of arguing back and forth with Liquid Web that this promotion had even existed. I have close to two dozen tickets dealing with the issues surrounding this server.The ticket I opened regarding this current problem is now well over two months old, and weeks pass by without any reply. This is despite having written to Liquid Web support through the chat several times to ask for someone to look at the open ticket. I had to open another ticket to bring attention to the existing ticket, and that ticket is now a month old and going nowhere.The Liquid Web sales team refuses to help, as they always do in situations like these. I have asked to speak to management several times, but my requests have been ignored.Needless to say, I am not a happy customer and I am once again considering leaving Liquid Web.

Review.Titre: The support from Diane Reacher was…
Review.Contenu: The support from Diane Reacher was awful, didn't solve my issue, and I tried to refresh the support chat and she was the only one who attended my queries. Lately, I'm very disappointed with the support and their lack of support

Review.Titre: My Server Migration Took 19 Days
Review.Contenu: My server migration took 19 days to complete, and on numerous occasions Liquid Web Tech Support and Migration failed to properly respond to ticket updates, requests for help, and reported issues.In addition, I am STILL battling with billing over a simple request for a prorated refund on the extra days that I was charged while permissions, scripts, pho, DNS, and other elements of the new server were overlooked, not installed, or otherwise not matched to the old server.It's simply unacceptable.

Review.Titre: A hell experience which you never wish to experience
Review.Contenu: A hell experience which you never wish to experience.I’ve spent hours, days, and weeks to fix issues they’ve caused, wasted a lot of time and money.If you have an issue with LiquidWeb, I suggest you post your complaints here and on as many sites as you possibly can, as well as BBB.ORGMy story is very long, most people won’t even read it so no point, I’m going to make it very short and simple, I said what I said above, you should search deep and read reviews for this company before you decide to hire them, I think the reason they get a lot of 5 star reviews is because some of their staff are very friendly, but knowledge wise and support I would give them -10 if I had the choice.Just go to Google and search:LiquidWeb ReviewsLiquidWeb ComplaintsMAKE SURE! That you sort the reviews with the lowest first, there are lots of FAKE positive reviews online so I always sort and read the low star reviews first.And if LiquidWeb responds to this, I don’t have time anymore to waste replying to you therefore you will not receive a reply as you are useless.

Review.Titre: Beware of their Billing Changes
Review.Contenu: I have had a server with them for some time and lately strange things started happening. They suddenly snuck in a charge for almost $40 a month for something that is already included on my server. When I asked why that was being billed when it is already included, the response was that it was supposed to be included in my bundled package, but it was never installed, but now it has been set to $0.00 again on my invoice. This is the worst thing I have ever heard. They tell me that when I ordered this server, it was supposed to come with something, they didn't install it and then now they are still keeping it on the invoice, but they are kind enough to mark it as $0.00 because it wasn't installed and is still not installed. I think they are trying to bill customers for things so they can make more money. Go over your invoices people. Beware! I would recommend checking your invoices once a year when you do business with this place.

Review.Titre: There are many fake reviews posted…
Review.Contenu: There are many fake reviews posted here, read the negatives first, don’t believe everything you see in the positive reviews which are many posted by employees.

Review.Titre: Buyer Beware! Fraudulent Billing
Review.Contenu: I worked with Liquid Web for more than 12 years hosting my website. However, the last two years were a disaster. They managed to bilk me out of $2,000+ by fraudulently double billing me. It all started when they were having problems with hosting my site and could not figure out what the issues were. Then they told me it was because my server was old and beyond useless and needed to be replaced. I gave them the ok and they created a new server. At the beginning of this process, which took about 3 weeks, I received a form type letter which outlined in technical jargon what they were planning to do. At the very end of the letter buried in the text they mentioned that that they needed to receive notice to discontinue any older server to avoid double billing. Because I did not see this line in the letter I did not know to tell them to discontinue my old server. They require having your credit card information and so they deduct their fees every month. So for two years they took money from my account for the server they determined was useless. I tried to resolve this with numerous staff there but they blew me off every time saying that they don't give refunds. Their staff were rude and cocky. They are very sneaky in their billing practices and I suggest to everyone to carefully review your bills. You may find similar issues if you do. I am giving them one star for the services that were provided successfully in my first 10 years with them.

Review.Titre: Overcharged for years with unnecessary charges.
Review.Contenu: 03/14/2023 update: Liquidweb has been unresponsive in spite of their promise to involve management in addressing our complaint. We are forwarding documents to our attorney and anticipate a filing in our local Small Claims Court later this week. We will continue to update Trustpilot until this matter is resolved. 03/08/2023 We use Liquidweb cloud sites service. I feel they offer a quality product in terms of uptime and speed. However I have been frustrated by their Customer Service Department regarding the amount of our monthly invoices. The problem is that we have had two line items on our invoices for well over 5 years that apparently no one at the company could correctly explain. This week tech support finally gave us the answer- we have been paying for services on sites we are no longer even hosting. In 5 years we have been over charged by $4,440.00.These charges are for MSSQL storage and SSL certificates. Over the years we have questioned these line items, but we were never told they were for inactive websites. We were only told that they were necessary charges.On Jan 12, 2023 we opened up ticket number 11600106 to address possible overcharges. We were notified that only 1 person in the company handled potential cost reductions. Even though we have followed up at least 5 times, we have not heard a single word from this person.We are beginning to suspect that Liquidweb purposely overcharges clients.We placed a phone call to Liquidweb sales and got a new price quote for the services we are currently receiving. The quote for new service was issued in minutes. The prices on the new quote would save our company over $1700.00 a year.The purpose of this review is to finally get someone’s attention at Liquidweb. We are willing to stay with them at a renegotiated price. Hopefully current and possible future Liquidweb clients can benefit from our story.

Review.Titre: Failing at the basics
Review.Contenu: Always interesting reading and comparing the lower and higher ratings. Difficult to reconcile them as being from the same company.And upfront – I am not a Liquid Web customer. My engagements with Liquid Web are escalations related to a serial spammer Liquid Web provides DNS and hosting services to.This spammer is known as a solo-ads person – Dominykas Gobe ala “Domas G”. For context – Google still returns links to old offers that Dominykas was flogging on WarriorForum. Dominykas has ignored every unsubscribe request I submitted over the course of a year or so.Having now reached out to Liquid Web a few times over the last year with well-evidenced and well-supported escalations, I can report that these escalations were all met with stony silence, and no action on Liquid Web's part. I know this because I am still getting up to ten spam emails a day from across multiple services that Liquid Web hosts for Dominykas.In my mind, points to the lower ratings probably being more accurate than the higher ratings. Some of the stories around their focus on revenue generation ahead of service supports that narrative. I imagine their relatively recent sale to private equity is probably making this worse.Regardless, I am not the only person reporting Dominykas’s spam emails to multiple spam reporting entities. And from what I am seeing, these reports are impacting deliverability.I imagine you want to give your online presence the best chance of success. You should be aware then that these deliverability impacts may potentially also affect your deliverability.Suggesting there are probably other providers you can find at the same or similar price points who will not carry equivalent risk. These providers may even deliver better service than the one- and two-star reviews here speak to because they can afford to pay service and support staff salaries instead of the private equity executive salaries that Liquid Web now also has to fund since Liquid Web sold themselves to a private equity fund.**Updated on 12-Oct-23.**Noting Liquid Web have asked for further details via Trustpilot - something like a reference number or email address. Otherwise TrustPilot will remove my review.I provided a reference to the email I sent to Liquid Web on 1-Aug 23 with the subject line,    "Further abuse complaint Re: "Abuse complaint | Serial spammer ignoring repeated unsubscribe requests over extended period (various, including domasg2.com, domsolo.com, domasg.com, and mailgobi.com)".There was no response from Liquid Web to that email.That email included an earlier email sent on 17-Jun-23  with the subject line,    "Abuse complaint | Serial spammer ignoring repeated unsubscribe requests over extended period (various, including domasg2.com, domsolo.com, domasg.com, and mailgobi.com)".There was no response from Liquid Web to that earlier email either.There were other emails including my last on 16-Aug-23 asking for a status update seeing as I was still receiving spam.And yet again, no response from Liquid Web to that email either.They are consistent at failing at the basics.

Review.Titre: Standard of Support has fallen off a cliff. Be cautious when considerng buying Cloudflare via LiquidWeb.
Review.Contenu: Although I left a good review 1+ years ago, ListHub's service has deteriorated dramatically. It seems they have outsourced Support to a very low-grade provider, who is just interested in reducing handling time, rather than solving the client's problem. First off, when you contact their support chat, the techs start providing answers, without waiting for the customer to advise the question.  So prepare yourself for the first 5 to 10 minutes to be a complete waste of time while the tech digs up a reply to a question you have not asked plus have no plan to ask!Second, anything related to buying Cloudflare via LiquidWeb, is a disaster.  Techs literally just send you a link to their internal set up documentation (which is either outdated or inaccurate) and don't wait for your question.   They send the link to the document and then terminate the call.  Shocking!!Third, if you do get a Tech to stay on the call long enough to read your question, then be prepared to get the wrong answer 4 times out of 5 (yes, literally) and be prepared for this to take days or weeks, rather than minutes or hours. Implementing a CDN is a little complex and their Support know very little about it.  In fact one of their sales/support team told me they couldn't provide support as it is a 3rd-party product.  LiquidWeb are happy to charge you, but Techs are not trained on providing Support.4th, the Techs always seem to default to responding about adding more DOMAINS, rather than adding more USERS to the account.  Despite us never ever asking about adding more domains and only asking about adding more Users (our Developers), the Techs always default to advising how easy it is to add more Domains. From our experience, DO NOT purchase Cloudflare via LiquidWeb as very few Techs know anything about it.  If any issues arise, it will take hours or even days to get the correct answer. In our case, it is months and we still don't have it resolved. We are still waiting to add more users and continue to be told about adding more domains.  But, we only have one domain!  We don't want to add more domains.  Please stop telling us about more domains!!

Review.Titre: Unreliable...
Review.Contenu: I have been with Liquid Web since 2016.Today is 13 days since they send me an invoice. I ask support to give me a few more days to pay it. They answered that they couldn't and suspended me in the next few minutes.It is unfair to treat me like this, considering that I've been paying all my invoices for more than six years...UPD I asked to move my ticket to a supervisor and they answered:"I will pass this ticket to our Senior agents. Their usual working hours are 12 AM - 4 PM EST Monday through Friday." [Ticket #: 10914685]Today is Sunday...Six years were good, but it seems like something has changed, and now LiquidWeb is no longer as impressive as it used to be. So... I'll migrate to another cloud servers provider.⚡️ UDP 2 (to Liquid Wed's comment below)Indeed, the support was very responsive to block my account:-----Sun, 21 Aug, 13:22Hello!I’ve got some issues. I’m going to pay early next week. Please don’t shut down the services.Sun, 21 Aug, 13:29The services weren't shut down yet though they will be shut down throughout this day. We can reactivate your account on 24 hours only if they get shut down, but no other extension is available.The services will be reactivated automatically upon payment. Thank you for your understanding!Sun, 21 Aug, 13:33 Your Account Is Now Suspended For Non-PaymentSun, 21 Aug, 13:31I’ve been your loyal client for many many years. You just can’t treat me like that.Sun, 21 Aug, 14:18I will pass this ticket to our Senior agents. Their usual working hours are 12 AM - 4 PM EST Monday through Friday.We thank you for your patience.-----It was Sunday...

Review.Titre: Liquid Web customer since 2016
Review.Contenu: I have been a subscriber with Liquid Web for over 6 years maintaining a dedicated server account. If you are looking for an honest managed dedicated hosting company with truly great support, as a long-time customer I warn you to ignore the dishonest ads and stay away. This company is 100% Hustler with zero customer service integrity.Multiple times I have discovered that I had zero or outdated backups available. This has happened several times this past year alone. I keep reaching out to Liquid Web support to try to resolve the issue but most of their support agents are extremely rude and disrespectful to communicate with.Today I discovered again, by chance that my server had not been backed up in 72 hours (3-day old files). I contacted Linux support and tried very hard to explain (to an agent who seemed that she could not have cared less) that if I needed to restore one of my WordPress sites and that if a recent backup was not available, my business would be over - The Liquid Web support agent responded to me saying that "... it was my responsibility to contact them and ask them to run a backup". Her reply can actually be confirmed by their own call transcript if they recorded the call as they claim to do.Two weeks prior I contacted them to request support for my backup files and checked back an hour later and discovered their support agent deleted every backup file for every website on the server. Again ZERO backups were available. This can be confirmed by chat and email transcripts.I would have migrated away from this company a long time ago, but migration is not easy when you have large sites and also want to avoid risking DNS downtime. But being a Liquid Web customer since 2016 my business is now suffering by having to constantly police this issue with them. Until I can get my websites over to a new host, I will be taking my own backups manually and downloading them away from Liquid Web so that I can be sure I have backups ready when I need them.Email and chat transcripts can validate this review.

Review.Titre: Customer Service Has Gone Downhill Bigtime…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been a customer of Liquid Web’s for nearly a decade at this point and their customer service has really hit rock bottom as of late. I spend a decent amount of money every month on a dedicated server and in recent months our traffic has gone down and we no longer need such powerful equipment so I contacted them asking to downgrade our server letting them know it was urgent so we could complete the process before our next billing cycle. I wanted to start the process right that day but they said they couldn’t do it on the phone and my account had to be reviewed by a “downgrade specialist” that can only be communicated with via email. I asked them how long does it take for them to respond and they literally said “I don’t know.” I told them it was urgent and I needed to talk to someone asap and they said just open a ticket and someone will get back to me when they are available. Well I opened a ticket and it has now been 72 hours / 3 days and there is no response! Zero! Not only that but I called in at the 48 hour mark to see what was going on and they said they will have a supervisor look into it and reach out to me. That was 24 hours ago and no response!I called in again today about it and they said the same thing. A supervisor will contact you. I asked how long because this is what happened yesterday and I still haven’t heard from anyone and they said there is exactly 1 supervisor on staff and they are busy and they don’t know how long it will take!! This is a complete and total joke, a significant SLA violation and they clearly do not care about you if you want to downgrade.When I upgraded my server years ago it was very smooth. Now when they are faced with the prospect of losing money from me I can’t get any help.The support has been terrible. I have been on the phone with them for over an hour at this point just trying to get an answer on my original ticket that has not been responded to in 72 hours! And they keep telling me “I don’t know when someone will respond.” And “No one is available to help you.” Totally ridiculous. So ridiculous, in fact, that I have to waste more time coming on here to leave a negative review in the hopes of actually getting help from support.Happy customer of 10 years now unhappy customer on the verge of leaving for another company. Absolute pity…

Review.Titre: i dont can creat server and cloud
Unsatisfactory Support
Review.Contenu: Unsatisfactory Support. The moment you have paid for a service within the whole company that has at least a 1000 employees, none of the senior managers are ever available to provide the support to their employees which a regular executive is not able to provide.It is extremely unacceptable and dissatisfying. I believe the only option left is to make a chargeback and find another provider.

Review.Titre: I have been with Liquid Web since 2016
Review.Contenu: I have been with Liquid Web since 2016. There was a great support team. However, something has changed.I wanted to clone my server to VPS, it there was some issues with that.The communication was extremely long. I had to wait for answers for hours and hours, so I needed to start a chat asking them to answer me through the ticket each day.I asked an agent on chat how I could complain, but there's even no way to do so; that's why I wrote this review.I wrote a ticket to complain (10429640), I was told that they help me asap, but since 24 hours I'm still waiting..

Review.Titre: Rude support.
Review.Contenu: Rude support.They ended the chat when I simply asked what we would need to do to add me to full access on one of my clients accounts...Edit: I had already solved the issue, I regrettably gave them more information on the issue and they contacted my client saying I shouldn't change the nameservers.

Review.Titre: Scammers with many fake positive reviews
our server has been hosted by Liquid…
Review.Contenu: our server has been hosted by Liquid Web for a few years now. We have experienced a pretty high level of outages, including them deciding to reboot in the middle of the work day. We are currently 31 hours into a complete outage with no ETA from them for restoration. we are in the process of migrating away from these losers.Wayne

Review.Titre: Absolute rubbish
Review.Contenu: Absolute rubbish. I had 3 days of them pretending to look into a critical email problem, with each tech support person pretending to work on it then hand it to someone else because 'my shift has ended', followed by five days (so far) of total radio silence.Absolutely abysmal customer service. If you actually need a working web site avoid at all costs.

Review.Titre: Liquid Web no longer cares.
Review.Contenu: What was once the best Tech support in the industry seems to now be outsourced overseas with horrible results.  Incompetent support has led to websites going down, files not being able to be uploaded and being locked out of wp-admin. And in the meantime, they have raised their hosting prices.  REALLY?  I've gone elsewhere and am not looking back.  Do NOT use this company.  You will regret it. (And the problems WERE BROUGHT TO THEIR ATTENTION prior to me leaving).

Review.Titre: I love  Liquid Web techs
Review.Contenu: I love  Liquid Web techs. They’re smart, great problem solvers, professional and very down to earth & approachable.  Ted Keener and Dominic Hudson just finished solving a long standing email problem on 2 of my accounts. Maya Gabrielle, Daniel, and Freddie the week before helped me get to the bottom of several hacks - and to clean them up and prevent future hacks. There are many others there, too who have helped us immensely over the 5 years we’ve been with them. It’s so nice knowing we can count on them to help solve important issues time and time again. These guys define the meaning of “managed” services. Five (5) stars to all of them!

Review.Titre: Terrible company.
Review.Contenu: Terrible company.They used to be good years ago and now their support is awful and takes weeks to halfway resolve any kind of issue. Overpriced for what they deliver as well. Stay away from this company they are a complete waste of time and money and you'll always get the runaround when their servers fail.

Review.Titre: I have been a victim of racist…
Review.Contenu: I have been a victim of racist discriminatory behaviour by liquid web, they have denied me service on the basis of me “using a vpn” I have repeatedly offered to provide all documentation pertaining to my identity and have included my driver’s license in my email to them, but they continued to refuse on what can only be as discrimination that I assume was caused by my name.

Review.Titre: Worst sales team ever.   Totally clueless and rude.
Review.Contenu: I contacted LiquidWeb to inquire about hosting services.   They did not get back to me for several days.   Then a man named Chris called me at 6am and woke me up.   I told him that he woke me up.   He said, "No worry, I will call you later."   No apology at all.  When I woke up, I called and asked to speak to a manager.   After 10 minutes of listening to the man type, he told me no manager was available.They are so clueless, I can't imagine how their actual service is.   Never going near this company again.

Review.Titre: Changed the rules without notify, poor support and more and more expensive
Review.Contenu: Changed the rules every time without send any notification and terrible support.A few services was not working for last month and now they want to increase $$$$Now i've got suspended because they changed my suspension date without tell me before and not even can help me for 24 hours. Already spend more than $10k and that's how they treat me.Too bad, I lose money, they are loosing a client.

Review.Titre: It has been a good service long time ago
Review.Contenu: We were Liquidweb happy customers until we have been hit by a Malware. Four days with no answer, malware scan from his side with problems, no one updating the ticket. Downloaded Wordfence and found the malware. I write to the assistance and they said we need to pay extra 49/month to the security and the clean up. Four days before. Big no!

Review.Titre: Their control panel is extremely…
Review.Contenu: Their control panel is extremely limited and total trash. The webfile manager is MonstaFTP, which is useless, there's no SSH access. The GUI is from my grandma's time where she didn't even had a DSL connection.I have managed to setup a WordPress, it took more than 15 minutes just to upload the files, extract them (through the s**t web ftp client) and once I did, the load speed of a stock WordPress.. oh... I don't even want to talk about it.Edit: All of those positive reviews are fake, better ask for a trial of their services so you can see with your eyes before paying a cent to them.

Review.Titre: Worst support team ever
Review.Contenu: Worst support team ever, DO NOT MIGRATE TO THEM!. They migrated our website TWO times and so many issues happended and their support team does not even respond. we lost $10k worth of sales. we will be taking Legal action against them for sure. if you want the best customer support and best quality servers (Google Cloud)  use WPEngine.

Review.Titre: Breach of contract.
Review.Contenu: We had a huge deal with them, where the location of the servers were utterly most important. We were told that all our servers would be in EU, however, they quickly changed that since they needed to save cost.This making us non GDPR compliant. Their legal team is useless as well their support. Telling us this was not in our contract. However we have email correspondence telling them then otherwise.I would highly recommend anyone to stay clear of this unprofessional company.If you're considering them, please take a look at WPEngine.

Review.Titre: Worst decision we made for our business…
Review.Contenu: Worst decision we made for our business was to Trust Liquid Web. We immediately saw that there is no leadership. They have entirely burned us a company, service is incompetent, and they have no idea how to provision servers to run large loads with PHP-fpm. We're now stuck and I am writing this post so other business like mine or just small businesses who need a host to stay clear of them as you will lose business and they can care less about fixing.

Review.Titre: Charging for service without actually providing the service
Review.Contenu: I ordered their $50/month 250 GB guardian backup plan several months ago. They started billing me for it but never fully activated the service. Mind you, this is a fully managed server plan without root access so their team is in charge of providing and managing this service. The support engineers acknowledged the problem but passed the buck to other team which never responded. In the meantime, if I were to lose any data on my server, I will be SOL

Review.Titre: Tech team are good but don't forget your old customer...
Review.Contenu: Tech team are good and helpul.Commercial team are not good at all. Nothing is done for long term customer (several years).Mega discount for new customers and nothing for old customers... (it's a shame I know it's not only this company but why not have a % of discount relating to years as customer...)I give one star because I have different exchanges with different people in the company but it's like speaking to walls.Solution evolves, competitors are here, prices are very high without discount and for old customer who would like to have new hardware.Also invoice generation system is very bad and not easy to use...

They have not got a clue what they are doing, leave you hanging for days and resolve nothing.  Please do not make the same mistake , i suggest you obtain hosting services elsewhere.

You need to call 3 to 5 times to get a knowledgeable person and then... he starts working on your case and ends the shift and the next one doesn't know what the previous did. Caused us great damages because Liquidweb doesn't have proper backup system.Also, they are too expensive.

Review.Contenu: Liquid Web is slowly becoming an awful hosting company. Their support is poor and employees untrained. They don't listen and you have to explain things many times to them. Review.Titre: I was a client of alphahosting
Review.Contenu: I was a client of alphahosting.  My account was bought by Liquid Web. It took me over a week to get connected to my database.  I often wouldn't hear back from my tickets I submitted.  Or it would take more than a few days. Finally I initiated a chat and the tech person immediately looked into the problem and saw it was a password issue.  My other complaint is I paid 15/month at alpha hosting but with Liquid web my cost climbed to 77+/month. I asked for a reduction and after a week I would hear that is the plan my account fits into.  So between the cost and the slow response time for my tickets. I do not want Liquid web as my hosting company.  At 77/month my tickets should be answered immediately.  Not a week later.

Review.Titre: 100% uptime guarantee
Review.Contenu: 100% uptime guarantee.  Their site says verbatim:Your Clients will Love the UptimeWe have your back, 24 hours per day, 365 days per year and offer 100% guaranteed uptime at high speed.Meanwhile, my site hosted through them has been down for over an hour now with no ETA on a fix and just generic copy/paste answers from support.  Lady on the phone was less than pleasant and just kept repeating "well what do you want me to do?".  False promises, not 100% uptime.  Bad hosting company.

Review.Titre: Deleted my sites without warning
Review.Contenu: They deleted all of my sites (I had 15+) with them without warning. I've been a customer for almost 10 years since the times when the platform was owned by Rackspace. I should have transferred my business from them when the acquisition happen but I had hopes they'd be decent stewards.I set up auto-payments when they transitioned. Despite 3+ years of successful payments on-time, I missed their notification regarding my credit card failure. With almost non-existent outreach from their end, they terminated my account. I am asking other developers I know that use them (some of which I referred) to cancel their accounts as well.

Review.Titre: Once upon a time there was a wonderful hosting...
Review.Contenu: Liquidweb had always surprised us with its professionalism and excellent technical support.Unfortunately, the quality has deteriorated significantly in recent years.We ourselves experienced the frustrations of their WordPress Managed Service that felt more like an unfinished product, charging us monthly to become their beta testers.Not to mention their Business Email service, with months of excuses for undelivered messages to multiple domains.If we add to all these disasters their dubious accounting practices, reducing annual payment contracts at will, I wonder if the management is aware of the bad direction their company is taking.A great shame how an excellent company can inexorably ruin their reputation in such a short time.

Review.Titre: Find another Company... they are backwards.
Review.Contenu: Ever since they took over from WiredTree they've screwed everything up. They can never get their billing accurate they continue to send me threatening emails and then when I correct them and they fix the problem they still shut down my server.

Review.Titre: Shocking Customer services
Review.Contenu: After 10 years with Liquid web there level of service has become unacceptable taking well over 48 hours to respond to a support request which has caused damage to my business. Would not recommend there services and will be moving my business away from then asap

Review.Titre: Lazy and rude humans
Review.Contenu: This review I am making not for their server quality but of their support quality. It is indeed hit or miss. I have filed a complaint but no one seems to hear me. The supervisors Darren Wise and Andrew Cronk clearly do not know how to read emails and have no plans of resolving it. Even a slightest empathy they don't have any. Even denied my request to pass it on to a Manager. Why? When agent is at fault they try all the ways to cover them up. Not good practice for such a reputable company.UPDATE: Another one got back, in the name of Devlin, that no further action will be taken. What? Is that how you take a complaint?@adminI have sent you an email as requested. Here is the ticket as well just in case 09144944. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Since March 2018 Liquid Web disabled…
Review.Contenu: Since March 2018 Liquid Web disabled all my websites and yet they CONTINUE to charge me DESPITE NUMEROUS cancellations by me. I had to cancel my AMEX card, and block your recurring charges. Now you charged me AGAIN today. You OWE ME 9 months at $220. $1800.00. I will now post publicly wherever I can. Several months ago I was asked on the support chat to verify that I wanted to stop my account, verified it, and I was asked if I had all the content transferred, confirmed yes. And still you are charging me. I will post this review everywhere I can, since you are operating fraudulently. When you refund me, I will stop posting publicly.

Review.Titre: support fraud
Review.Contenu: support fraud, zero response from abuse department, after 11 days of wait their livechat suggest me to send another email - unless you are doing scum please do find another more legit provider. Fraudster - you are surely welcome here

Review.Contenu: They Only Looking for the Money without any help for new customer, I have an issue with them i just asking for my IP range and they don't need to give me my IP and they tell me they don't support the Hyper-V  and they don't need to refund my payment back i already take the dedicated server for only 1 hours after i make chating with them they refund the money back to my account and when i make request the new server they ask me for the payment by this replay (They cannot be applied to activation invoices. You need to supply the account with a positive payment to activate your new services.), this not helpful and not good and i don't trust them anymore.

Review.Titre: Apparently liquidweb  has gone full…
Review.Contenu: Apparently liquidweb  has gone full liberal. They can't seem to continue business with my good friends conservative website. If this is what the democrats want, then we're in for a rough 4 years.

Review.Titre: This company has become ridiculous
Review.Contenu: This company has become ridiculous. After signing up, they want you to send them two government ID pieces to get a hosting account. Not sure who they think they are, but they can not ask for that. In today's cybercrimes world, I, for one, would not email or send my passport or DL to someone I don't know. As a corporation, they should look it up and verify us but ask for something when they are not a government entity is wrong. We will find hosting elsewhere, that's for sure. They need to post where people can see they require additional information that you should only give to a government office, not a simple hosting company that doesn't need it. I was buying hosting services, not applying for a loan.

Review.Titre: Avoid them
Review.Contenu: Avoid them. They have fast response but Zero taking care of your data and server. You may lose them simply and they will not do any thing to you!

Review.Titre: Stay away from Liquid Web hosting
Review.Contenu: Stay away from Liquid Web hosting. I own an agency and decided to use their managed Wordpress hosting. Their hosting environment has a known bug which they know about that randomly causes the servers to crash. You would think since they know about it they would monitor the sites and automatically fix the sites when they go down, but that is not the case. If the sites go down, you have to call them to tell them to get it fixed. They absolutely refuse to do anything on their end to remedy the issue. They told me to contact the creators of php to get their server environment bug fixed. Now they just want me to change hosting plans acting like moving and testing 50 sites will be no big deal. Absolutely terrible customer service and experience. Please stay away from this company and save yourself the trouble. Especially if you are an agency with multiple sites to host.

Review.Titre: From greatest to the worest
Review.Contenu: It was great company for years but in last two years... they killed my trust with my customers! Lost all backups and they said what!! We do not have backup recovery for your server! I lost 2 months of my time to rebuild websites for customers and gave them one free year for hosting due to my mistake and I lost more than 30% of my angry customers. They killed me. I paid for one server for one year and the other for two years! So, I had no choice to stay with this worst company and I bear the consequences of my mistake for being customer with these losers. Until today my reputation with customers has issue. They did not apologize or say any thing. Not there mistake! The rest of time for my servers were always slow respond from support and I could not trust them any more. I have to take other servers from other company. In same time, losing many taking debts and blames.

Review.Titre: Many Issues with Liquid Web
Review.Contenu: We used to be with Wiredtree (great company) which was purchased by Liquid Web.  Since then we have seen our monthly cost go up and quality of service go down.  Our "Managed Server" was hit by WordPress hackers, so we asked support for help.  They told us we had to buy a separate "Security" package so that they could help us.  We were desperate so we did, but they took days to implement and restore issues from the hackers.  We ended up losing many clients.  Then, our server was coming up on EOL OS and needed to be upgraded, so we asked them to do that but they told us we need to buy a second server to migrate our current server to the new server.  So now they are charging us double for the same service.  We had enough of this company and are moving on.  We would not recommend Liquid Web.

Review.Titre: Beware of billing once you cancel service.
Review.Contenu: It's been 2 years since I cancelled service and still getting billed for a backup image that was taken 2 years ago. Called/email multiple times and still getting bills and finally had to put a vendor block to stop them from ripping me every month. If you discontinue service with them, keep a close eye on your monthly statements to make sure they don't bill you for cancelled service. As for technology, the offerings are few years behind. Once they ask me to cancel a service on mobile view of control panel, when the link didn't exist. Do yourself a favor and pick one of the many cloud hosting providers. Plain and simple billing, cutting edge tech and peace of mind. These billing practices reminds me of gym memberships from years ago.

Review.Titre: The Worst Hosting Company I Have Ever Used
Review.Contenu: What a fall from grace.  I have used the service for a few years now and the service has gone from very good to TERRIBLE.  Firstly my sites have been going offline daily for months, their Phillipine customer support who pose with western names are next to useless, if they find an error and fix it you can be sure they will have created two more problems.  I have lost so much revenue due to downtime.  The final nail in the coffin is when they recommened a new server for me to use, which i then paid for but have been told they cannot migrate the data over from my old server as the server they have setup is using their own alternative of Cpanel.  Of course i wont get a refund.  I have lost $1000's over the last few months due to this company and i strongly suggest anyone who wants a reliable host does not use this service

Review.Titre: Worst Customer/Tech Support Ever!!
Review.Contenu: I had created a single site service, and needed to move to a multi-site service. The process was supposed to take 30 minutes, but instead it took about 2 days. Then a couple of weeks later I got a bill for $239 (Multisite is supposed to be $99). I had to spend nearly 2 hours dealing with trying to get the to fix the billing and system issues the DAY AFTER CHRISTMAS!! And the first thing the online customer care rep did was to blame me. That I was supposed to do something about it. Not Happy! I will be moving this simple small site to another provider, as I do not ever want to have to deal with them again. (FYI, when I called them via phone, there was a very friendly and helpful customer rep, but even she was saying there would be a few more steps I would have to do after the call to make sure it was handled properly). Yeesh!

Review.Titre: No longer what it used to be.
Review.Contenu: I have been Liquidweb customer for more than 5 years. I run multiple VPS and high traffic websites. All my sites have been down for more than 3 days and the technical support kept telling me the issue was from their supplier, Level3.netI had to spend hours on the phone to technically demonstrate that the issue was from their own DC. Finally they realised they had an issue with a network switch and out of the blue, everything started to work again. 3 days of downtime on all my sites and traffic has been my worst nightmare in 2019. I was not even offered an explanation or a technical review and what they will do to prevent such issue in the future. A Liquidweb BLANK MOMENT. I have already started to look into alternative for my DR and hopefully a total switch to a new host soon. (In case you are actually reading this, CaseId=5003a00000ucgxJ)

Review.Titre: Save the pain and avoid this company
Review.Contenu: I was a happy customer of Beyond Hosting until Liquid Web took over. While the support team tried to be helpful, it did not solve my problem. They deleted my data before migration could be completed.I have multiple websites wiped out and I have to rebuild each website. Fortunately, I have some backup and I could restore some sites but surely it will be on another hosting company. I still lost some data. This is unacceptable for a so-called "world-class" web hosting company.I write this not to defame Liquid Web but to warn other Business Owners not to put their business on Liquid Web. The loss of revenue and effort can truly be devastating.Please avoid this company.Liquid Web Support Ticket #: 05720783**************Reply:The request to terminate the server because I am terminating my subscription to your service after you have wiped out all my data.

Review.Titre: Security and billing issues
Review.Contenu: Awful support and the billing are just a nightmare. Over-priced and not well-secured servers. LiquidWeb used to be a good host. Not anymore.

Review.Titre: Server under performed computationally, got scammed
Review.Contenu: Server under performed computationally, requested a refund. They then proceeded to dodge me and charge me for an extra month, had to cancel my credit card.

Review.Titre: Horrible experience and horrible…
Review.Contenu: Horrible experience and horrible servers. I can't believe they took over $1300 of my money, gave me trash servers that still after 30 days wouldn't function correctly, and pretty much left me with no other choice but to shut them down and move to a new data center with servers that actually work.This place is only interested in stealing your hard-earned money. They are not interested in providing you with satisfactory support or a quality product.Very disappointed I was expecting a more professional environment with higher standards. Instead, I was given dedicated cloud servers that were retired 8 years ago and stored in the janitor's broom closet and they ran like crapola. 30 days after purchasing and I still couldn't use them that is just sad and horrible service. When you have support tickets with over 100 replies back and forth concerning a single server that should be the first clue that there is something major wrong with your product.Stay away from this business if you value your time and your money.

Review.Titre: Chat and support for billing is nearly worthless
Review.Contenu: Coming from SiteGround where a chat window is usually connected to a rep immediately [or at least under a minute] and the problem is solved, I find Liquid Web's chat support wait times abominable - if the chat takes place at all.  Opening a ticket isn't necessarily a solution.  I still have a very simple billing ticket question open for nearly a week.  I had to call them to ask them to address the ticket.  Only their senior support specialist can answer my question?  You can't help me on the phone?  You won't resolve my open ticket?  I guess they don't want to get paid via ACH funds.  My invoice link is dead.   How can I submit for my expense account?  Why can't you invoice my Accounts Payable monthly?  Not everyone in corporate America can use their credit cards for IT expenses due to compliance issues.  This is simple stuff.  I'm not sure I want to know what happens when things get more complicated.  I hope this lack of support is limited to billing.

Review.Titre: Deleted websites after 30 days
Review.Contenu: I was very happy with Wired Tree - Liquid Web took over. Though their help staff chat was excellent, their sales system has me shellshocked. I am at fault to some degree, but this is unacceptable. What happened. My visa card showed charges I didn't approve, the bank picked up and cancelled card. It took two weeks to get new card and pin, more time to think all the places it was entered online. I wasn't well and didn't check emails. Liquid Web sent an "invoice unpaid" message and auto reminders saying my account "could be suspended". I did not see them. Then I realised emails were not coming through, twigged its the card change, paid the bill, but the amount was not correct. Opened chat with billing - was informed that after just over the month - they had terminated my account. Not suspended. Terminated. Websites deleted, emails, backups,gone- nothing to be found. If that sends a shiver down your spine - check every bill every 29 days. Bad.

Review.Titre: I ask to switch to one of your bundles…
Review.Contenu: I ask to switch to one of your bundles and you cant migrate us?  We have to reinstall everything?   We cant even pay a fee to migrate?

Review.Titre: Not keen on customer loyalty.
Review.Contenu: I was a customer with WiredTree until LiquidWeb bought over and all accounts were transferred. Transfer had some minor issues which were handled well and I was happy with everything until the first renewal. Since mine is a transfer account, it had to be converted to one of LiquidWeb's specific account. I choose one with similar specs as what I had on WiredTree and paid for 2 years in advance. Reason I paid for 2 years in advance is because of the attractive discount.2 years flew by and it was time to renew. During these 2 years, support was good but not as good as WiredTree. But I was with them and had no intention of changing anyway, so I went ahead to renew. Was shocked to learn that the 2-year discount offer was only for new customers and not existing customers. This meant a more than 100% increase in costs for services that I feel are really over priced. I managed to find another host with similar features, at a quarter of what they charge. I moved out from LiquidWeb a year ago to the new host and have no regrets.Honestly, LiquidWeb servers are over priced but with 2 year discount packages when paid up front, it is ok. When the discounts are removed, it is totally not worth it.

Review.Titre: Requires phone number -- will reject your order otherwise!
Review.Contenu: Heard good things, I needed temporary (1 month) emergency e-mail hosting while I setup another VPS with another host and my own mail server.I'm very security conscious which is why I provided them a fake telephone number because their system wouldn't allow me to proceed with the order without providing one.After going through checkout and paying via PayPal, it said something along the lines of "A member of our sales team will call you to introduce themselves, the service and welcome you to blah blah blah"...Needless to say I didn't receive the call, instead they sent me an email to say they've rejected my order, and that they'll refund me shortly.The refund didn't come either, had to get in touch with their team to manually issue one.These companies do not legally need a phone number to do business with you and they're the first hosting company I've dealt with that has rejected an order from me, and for such stupid reason at that.Thanks for wasting my time you privacy invading trolls.

Review.Titre: It appears I'm joining a que
Review.Contenu: Disappointed, frustrated, annoyed - the one thing you need from support is them to be fully with you to achieve everything being resolved to your satisfaction.   You shouldn't be spending all day wondering if you are actually going to get a response.As others have stated on their reviews support is dreadful.  As an ex Wiredtree customer of many years, maybe I was spoilt, but wow they could supply support, Liquid Web I believe did have this level of support but it is certainly not there now.I have just been migrated over to Interworx and I am honestly wondering what the hell is going on.  Open tickets are only answered if constantly being prompted to look via web chat.  Even now after expressing my displeasure at the way support has been provided I am still awaiting a response and we are now hours on.As others have stated if support is as poor as this is proving to be you start to look elsewhere.  So if you are looking to join Liquid Web and have come here to get a feeling for the company all I can say is the speed and server reliability is there but the support is woefully lacking

Review.Titre: TERRIBLE Windows hosting support
Review.Contenu: Sadly I have watched LW tech support for windows just get worse and worse as time goes on. I can remember a time when using the chat support feature 99% of the time they would be able to solve the problem on the spot, now it rarely happens, the tech either makes it a email support request or even on occasion has flat out lied to me in the chat, which I later asked them about. I have even tried escalating to a supervisor on shift but rarely would I get a response. My last issue involved trying to exchange some bad ip address that THEY assigned to me, took 5 days to solve the ticket!! and 3 different supervisors. Also recently I had an issue with file permissions I was transferred to another support tech and I really think that they just ignored the request me to spite me, after 40 minutes of waiting, there was no more response in the chat window yet it remained open and I could send them messages like "hello are we still connected?"  This company used to have STELLER Customer support but now its a complete waste of my time, If I could change them out I would and would NEVER use them again.

Review.Titre: I noticed they were charging much more…
Review.Contenu: I noticed they were charging much more than their announced priced from my credit card.Very bad business etics. If they notice that you don’t login, they charge more.Current 4gb vps promotional price is $49Regular current 4gb vps price is $99What they charged for my 4gb vps for months = $149 !!!!!I also noticed that ip price is $1 but they charged me $2 per ip for years.When I noticed that they are charging my card more than they should, I openned a ticket. They told me that they write their prices on their website and I need to check my bills regularly. I requested a refund but its been weeks and they dont even reply.And before that happen they downgraded my server without telling while I was paying the same price. When I checked my server configuration I noticed that it was downgraded and they said it was an accident and upgraded it back. I thought it was a mistake at first but im not sure anymore.Used their services for many many years. If you dont keep an eye on the bills they will charge more.But I must say that their service doesn’t have downtimes and support is generally pretty fast but terrible at billing.

Review.Titre: I have been a loyal Liquid Web customer…
Review.Contenu: I have been a loyal Liquid Web customer for over 12 years, but they have instituted changed over the past year that has even got their tech department complaining. Their latest billing change now makes it so that customers who don't pay their bill one day after it is created are considered 'overdue' by Liquid Web. They have gone from a Net 15 days company to Net 0 and are requiring customers to put in some form of payment card or Paypal account number in the account which is then forced into AutoPay. I spoke directly with an Account Services Specialist and had this confirmed. By forcing customers to put a credit card or Paypal, they will then bill you immediately on day bill is created. Even companies as bad as Xfinity give you 30 days to pay your bill. As I had an old credit card listed on my account I received a scary e-mail stating that if I didn't immediately pay my bill, my service would be disconnected. I have paid the same way for 12 years and now Liquid Web is saying you must pay immediately or else we will cut you off. This is why they are now losing customers and gaining the reputation hey have.It's sad as they were the only hosting company our news site promoted.

Review.Titre: One can no longer trust Liquidweb with…
Review.Contenu: One can no longer trust Liquidweb with something as important as their web hosting needs!I have been with Liquidweb since March 16, 2005. it was once a great company but my latest invoice was generated on August 14, 2019 with a due date of August 13, 2019 and contained an immediate cut off notice. Since I have never seen an invoice generated with a due date earlier than the date of the invoice, I called Billing and was on hold for 47 minutes. Since this long wait time was also a first time Liquidweb experience for me, I called Sales and was immediately commented to someone in Texas who told me he had just arrived in the office and that his email was filled with questions from customers regarding this same issue. I later called Billing again and was successful in getting through. I was told that this is the new business policy of the billing department of Liquidweb, to not invoice until after the due date and to threaten immediate suspension of service with that late invoice.After over 14 years of being a loyal customer (I even won a prize from Liquidweb for posting a testimonial a couple of years ago), I feel I must move to a more reliable hosting provider. Thank all the oldtimers for their wonderful service over the years.

Review.Titre: RESOLVED: Dont use them. Worst provider
Review.Contenu: Its happening again. This is the last time i will use them. Lost my clients thats to them

Review.Titre: Charged me sales tax for nine months…
Review.Contenu: Charged me sales tax for nine months when they should not have as I had the server for business purposes. Their exemption form did not accept uk limited company info when it should have and staff were unhelpful for months, and would not refund. I have no alternative but to leave.Update: I told LW I was exempt back in January but their online system would not accept company registration numbers (even though it says it does)  and LW's support was unhelpful. After multiple contacts, 9 MONTHS after the original contact, they finally send me an exemption form. Having already paid over $200 in taxes I should not have been billed for in the first place (and LW wouldn't refund), I have left LW and am much happier for it and saving about $80pm on fees. They have lost $7,100 in server fees over the next 5 years, and possibly triple that as I have two other dedicated servers elsewhere. That's what they get for implementing a tax without 1. Training staff properly about the tax, including their Billing staff, and 2. Not setting up their online system correctly so that Ltd companies without VAT registration can opt out. 3. Taking 9 months to enable me to opt out. The form they sent me in September should have been sent in January. It's a complete farce which, as you can see, LW take no responsibility for. Awful company in my opinion.

Review.Titre: More than once I have created a tech…
Review.Contenu: More than once I have created a tech support ticket with some degree of urgency only to have it remain "open" for up to 10 hours. All I got from the Chat "human" response was "sorry, I'll escalate your ticket." There is NO EXCUSE for this kind of poor service. I lost customers because they couldn't install an SSL certificate two years in a row. I'm about to lose another one because it has taken 12 hours to find out why a customer's site takes more than 45 seconds to load.

Review.Titre: Too expensive …
Review.Contenu: I pay 1248 a month and I had a critical error. I could get a back up because I’m not subscribed to some other service.

Review.Titre: Stable platform but poor account management support
Review.Contenu: I've been a customer for a number of years (since Liquid Web acquired Rackspace Cloud Sites) and never had a problem. I then signed up for a 2 year VPS contract having been told the email capability was equal that of my current solution. It was not the case. It was a downgraded version and had no calendar or out of office capability that my client was used to.4 months or so into the contract I raised the issue that I had been mis-sold. After 18 long months of back and forth, LW eventually admitted fault and offered me credits to go back onto my original email plan.This lasted only 2 months. The moment I came out of VPS contract, the credits expired - even though I rolled onto a pay monthly plan. At no time have LW tried to resolve this for me.
